skills.name: Thermal Laser
skills.description:
Fires a laser beam that continuously deals DMG along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies take more DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less). Ultimate Evasions reset heat gauge and boost wielder's Attack Speed by 50% for 2s. CD: 8.0s.
[Ranger] Character takes 20% less Ice DMG. If any teammate is equipped with a Ranger series weapon, then Ultimate Evasion also recovers 2 SP.

skills.name: Heat Discharge
skills.description: [SP: 14][CD: 30s] For the next 11s, wielder attacks gain 12% Physical DMG but has 60% slower Move Speed. Buff also cancels distance-based damage reduction of the weapon.
